newsitem.title: USA: Phoenix Resources says sued by lender.
newsitem.headline: Phoenix Resources says sued by lender.

text.p: Phoenix Resources Technologies Inc said on Monday a lawsuit was filed against it by one of the lenders to the wood-products division that was sold on August 28.
The lawsuit alleges Phoenix Resources is liable for an unpaid balance of $3.1 million on a note owed to the Agricultural Production Credit Association, Phoenix Resources said.
The company and legal advisers are considering all options and expect to announce a course of action within 10 days.

Shortly after selling the division, Phoenix sought protection from creditors under Chapter 11. When the unit was sold, it got a warranty against outstanding debts by the purchaser, but it is unknown if this is still functional.
